keywords: Coach drivers,Drivers,Freight industry,L,R,Congestion Charge,Contract,Corporate information,Environment,Low Emission Zone,Coaches,Driving,Motorcycle,Taxis and minicabs,TfL
description: The agreement for Capita Business Services Limited to provide Congestion Charging, London Low Emission Zone services and Traffic Enforcement was signed in 2015

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["On 1 November 2015 the Agreement began for Capita Business Services Limited to provide Congestion Charging, London Low Emission Zone services and Traffic Enforcement. This followed expiry of the London Road User Charging Agreement with IBM."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
This Agreement comprises of two parts: the Business Operations Agreement and Enforcement Operations Agreement.

These contractual documents have had part, or all, of their content redacted for reasons of data protection or commercial confidentiality (for example, names of staff members, address details and amounts of contractual payments).
